review_data.title: Unwanted hair found
review_data.content: Been going here for a few years. Last time however we ordered 70 CHF worth of sushi just to find a 'private', curly hair in the rice. Goodbye forever NegishiMore

review_data.title: A quaint sushi bar at Oerlikon
review_data.content: Just at the Oerlikon station next to Swissotel we stayed, a convenient place for a quick sushi treat. Very friendly staff as well as patrons who told us where to go in Zurich on New Years eve

review_data.title: Très bon Sushi à l emporter !

review_data.title: Top Qualität und freundliches Personal!
review_data.content: Es war sehr lecker und das Personal war sehr nett. Ich kann es nur wärmstens weiterempfehlen. Wir kommen wieder.

review_data.title: Take-away sushi
review_data.content: I placed my order online to pick up a large sushi order 45min later. The order was ready and packed correctly in time. The sushi as well as the wasabi and ginger were good quality and tasted very fresh. The price level is in line...More

review_data.title: Dinner
review_data.content: Great Quality. At the end we were still hungry and wanted to pick another box. But he offered to make a special sushi. Fabulous!

review_data.content: Gut organisiert, freundlich und frisch! Hier stimmt einfach alles. Ich liebe die vielen, originellen, bunten und super leckeren Vegan Varianten....More

review_data.title: Very expensive, sushi just ok
review_data.content: Negishi is quite expensive and one would expect that the sushi is correspondingly very good. Unfortunately this is not the case; the sushi is at best average, mostly it is lacking in taste.More

review_data.title: Great take away sushi
review_data.content: Fresh and tasty sushi! Average prices and friendly service. The location at Oerlikon train station is very convenient. More of a take away place, because there are very few seats.More

review_data.title: Great sushi and rolls In Zurich
review_data.content: We've ordered various dishes from Negishi several times already, and everything is always well made and fresh. Delivery is super efficient: last time it took only around 15 minutes to bring everything to our doorstep.More

review_data.title: Buen sushi a buen precio (L)

review_data.title: Sushi an Silvester

review_data.title: Convenient and cheap
review_data.content: Located in a convenient position near offices, it's perfect for lunch. Sushi is fresh and tasty and it's really cheap! They have gluten free sauce and are prepared on the matter, too.

review_data.title: Sushi bar right in Oerlikon train station
review_data.content: Conveniently located sushi bar right in the Oerlikon train station. Good selection of sushi, on-site sushi chef will make whatever you want if you don't see it in the display. Restaurant is small, outside seating.
